body:
Comment 6: 
Thanks, I think you're right.  I thought at first that converting -1 to uint8 was
different from converting 257 to uint8, but I guess either way it's the same issue: do
you treat conversion of float to unsigned int as a conversion from float to int followed
by a conversion from int to unsigned int, or is it just implementation-defined.  Bsaed
on issue #3423 it's implementation defined here too.
_Status changed to **Duplicate**._ _Merged into issue #3423._
